data.message: Hi😊 How can I to get "on this day-app"? Everyone has it, but I don't... I want to see my memories to....

replies.message: Hey there, André. You can learn more about how to adjust your On This Day notifications here: http://on.fb.me/1QYxbv4. Please let us know if you have any more questions. -Nancy

No, because I dont even have the app or program that makes "on this day". The problem is on step two in the link you shared with me, I dont have 'see more of'... Im not sure what it says in the american version, I only have the Norwegian version. I thougt evryone got "on this day" app in a Facebook-update or something. Do you have any suggestions on how I also can get "on this day". Sorry for my bad english, im Norwegian...😊
My "on this day" app doesn't work too.. I did the steps from here and when I go to see more, there is no "on this day" 😔 everybody is using it, but it's not working for me..
I don't have on this day app either.
